code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MusicLibrary=()=>{const[library,setLibrary]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchLibrary=async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const response=await axios.get('/api/music',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setLibrary(response.data);};fetchLibrary();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Your Music Library"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc",children:library.map(song=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"mb-2",children:song.title},song._id))})]});};export default MusicLibrary;
